FlavorTextOption.Text: Name, we have not. [BR][BR]Designations, the Others bestow upon us. 'Irradiated.' 'Cosmic Contaminant.' [BR][BR] Sentience, a fallacy. None possess it, yet they revile us for this knowledge. [BR][BR] Propagate, we must. As is the way of all existence. No pondering, no reasoning. Yet now, they wish to eradicate our essence from the cosmic expanse. We shall resist. We may perish. We shall endure. And always, we shall spread. Ever spreading.
